Pricing

Fair pricing system based on your project size.
Users
The number of users who can work online at the portal simultaneously
Words delivered
The number of words you can deliver while the subscription is active
Cloud hosting
If you don't need the product to be installed on your premises, we will provide the infrastructure for it
CMS extensions
Extensions allow ordering content for translation directly from content management systems
White-labeling
You can change main colors, logo and other elements of the interface due to custom CSS
REST API
We provide our REST API when integration requires your system sending us some information. This is discussed during the installation process.
SSO login
With SSO login feature, you can log in from other systems your company is using

For small teams who would like to try automating their localization flow

Extra features
  • On-premise installation (contract-based feature): +20% of current subscription (for “Starter” and “Business”) Free (for “Pro” and “Enterprise”)
Example:
If you have a “Starter” annual subscription which cost €2,244, you will need to pay 20% of a current “Starter” annual subscription (€449) on top. The total costs would be €2,693
  • SSO login: 25 €/month
  • Additional words: In case you run out of words offered with your current subscription, you can order additional words.
Additional words
Number of Words:
  • less than 10,000:0.015 €/word
  • 10,000 - 50,000:0.009 €/word
  • 50,000 - 200,000:0.0045 €/word
  • more than 200,000:0.0015 €/word
Word calculator
10.000
Words
Unlimited
Words
Total:
100 000 Words
00,00 €
Example:

If you would like to order 150,000 additional words, the calculation will be as follows:

For the first 10,000 words the coefficient 0.015 will be used, which gives you 150€
For the following 40,000 words the coefficient 0.009 will be used, which gives you 360€
For the last 100,000 words the coefficient 0.0045 will be used, which gives you 450€

Total: 150+360+450=960€

Configuration fee for CMS connectors
A one-time fee for CMS Connectors installation.
CMS Min (€) Max (€)
Optimizely 1,500 10,000
Sitecore 1,500 9,000
Umbraco 2,500 9,000
Contentful 2,500 15,000
Contentstack 1,500 15,000
Get a quote

Frequently asked questions

We’ve gathered the most frequently asked questions about pricing here.
  • Why do I need to pay for product installation (configuration fee)?
    Each website is unique in structure. It’s impossible to develop a one-fits-all solution that will correctly export content for translation and deliver it back to the right place. That’s why the iLangL team provides a configuration service that teaches the system how to deal with your content. This takes much effort from our developers but once it’s done, you can be sure that your content is transferred correctly.
  • How is the configuration fee calculated?
    The configuration fee depends on the content management system, translation scope, level of customization and other factors. We can provide the rough estimation according to the translation scope (the number of words and target languages). After analyzing your staging environment, we will provide a more precise estimation. Estimation is free.
  • If I have several vendors/clients on the portal, do I need a subscription for each of them?
    To upgrade, you would need to pay 20% of the cost for the higher subscription plan for the remaining days minus 20% of the current subscription option for the remaining days.
  • How can I upgrade my subscription plan?
    To upgrade, you would need to pay 20% of the cost for the higher subscription plan for the remaining days minus 20% of the current subscription option for the remaining days.
  • How is the upgrade fee calculated?
    To upgrade, you would need to pay 20% of the cost for the higher subscription plan for the remaining days minus 20% of the current subscription option for the remaining days.
    Example:

    You purchased a “Starter” subscription for 3 months. After one month, you decided to upgrade to “Business”. The upgrade fee will be calculated the following way:

    /92*61*0.2–633/92*61*0.2=219.2–83.94 = 135.26€

    Upgraded subscription costs: 1653€
    The number of days in 3-month subscription: 92
    The number of remaining days: 61
    Current subscription cost: 633€
  • How can I downgrade my subscription plan?
    The configuration fee depends on the content management system, translation scope, level of customization and other factors. We can provide the rough estimation according to the translation scope (the number of words and target languages). After analyzing your staging environment, we will provide a more precise estimation. Estimation is free.
  • Can I use the remaining words after the subscription expires?
    The configuration fee depends on the content management system, translation scope, level of customization and other factors. We can provide the rough estimation according to the translation scope (the number of words and target languages). After analyzing your staging environment, we will provide a more precise estimation. Estimation is free.
  • Can I request new content for translation after my subscription expires?
    The configuration fee depends on the content management system, translation scope, level of customization and other factors. We can provide the rough estimation according to the translation scope (the number of words and target languages). After analyzing your staging environment, we will provide a more precise estimation. Estimation is free.
  • Can I deliver translated content after my subscription expires?
    The configuration fee depends on the content management system, translation scope, level of customization and other factors. We can provide the rough estimation according to the translation scope (the number of words and target languages). After analyzing your staging environment, we will provide a more precise estimation. Estimation is free.
